\documentclass[12pt]{article}
\usepackage[margin=1in, landscape]{geometry}
\usepackage{multirow}

\usepackage{amsmath}
\usepackage{fancyhdr}
\usepackage{hyperref}
\usepackage{graphicx}
\newcommand{\compactlist}{\setlength{\itemsep}{0pt} \setlength{\parskip}{0pt} \setlength{\leftskip}{-1em}}

\lhead{MATH 4263/5373}
\rhead{Nov. 25, 2019}
\chead[RE]{Formulas for \(f'(x_0)\) and \(f''(x_0)\) (see L. Brin ``Tea Time Numerical Analysis'')}
\cfoot{}
%\rfoot{Code for figure and report is available in the class folder.}
\pagestyle{fancy}
\begin{document}


\renewcommand{\arraystretch}{2}
\begin{center}
\begin{tabular}{p{1in}lp{1.5in}l}
%\hline
\multirow{2}{*}{2-point} & \( f'(x_{0})=\frac{f(x_{0} + h) - f(x_{0})}{h}\) & \( - \frac{h}{2}f''(\xi_{h})\) & forward diff.\\%[1em]
 & \( f'(x_{0})=\frac{f(x_{0}) - f(x_{0} - h)}{h}\) & \( + \frac{h}{2}f''(\xi_{h})\) & backward diff.\\%[1em]
\hline\multirow{3}{*}{3-point} & \( f'(x_{0})=\frac{ - 3f(x_{0}) + 4f(x_{0} + h) - f(x_{0} + 2h)}{2h}\) & \( + \frac{h^{2}}{3}f'''(\xi_{h})\)& forward diff.\\%[1em]
 & \( f'(x_{0})=\frac{f(x_{0} + h) - f(x_{0} - h) }{2h}\) & \( + \frac{h^{2}}{6}f'''(\xi_{h})\)& centered diff.\\%[1em]
 & \( f'(x_{0})=\frac{f(x_{0} - 2h) - 4f(x_{0} - h) + 3f(x_{0})}{2h}\) & \( + \frac{h^{2}}{3}f'''(\xi_{h})\)& backward diff.\\%[1em]
\hline
\multirow{5}{*}{5-point} & \( f'(x_{0})=\frac{ - 25f(x_{0}) + 48f(x_{0} + h) - 36f(x_{0} + 2h) + 16f(x_{0} + 3h) - 3f(x_{0} + 4h)}{12h}\) & \( + \frac{h^{4}}{5}f^{(5)}(\xi_{h})\)& forward diff. I\\%[1em]
 & \( f'(x_{0})=\frac{ - 3f(x_{0} - h) - 10f(x_{0}) + 18f(x_{0} + h) - 6f(x_{0} + 2h) + f(x_{0} + 3h)}{12h}\) & \( + \frac{h^{4}}{20}f^{(5)}(\xi_{h})\)& forward diff. II\\%[1em]
 & \( f'(x_{0})=\frac{f(x_{0} - 2h) - 8f(x_{0} - h) + 8f(x_{0} + h) - f(x_{0} + 2h)}{12h}\) & \( + \frac{h^{4}}{30}f^{(5)}(\xi_{h})\)& centered diff.\\%[1em]
 & \( f'(x_{0})=\frac{ - f(x_{0} - 3h) + 6f(x_{0} - 2h) - 18f(x_{0} - h) + 10f(x_{0}) + 3f(x_{0} + h)}{12h}\) & \( + \frac{h^{4}}{20}f^{(5)}(\xi_{h})\)& backward diff. I\\%[1em]
 & \( f'(x_{0})=\frac{3f(x_{0} - 4h) - 16f(x_{0} - 3h) + 36f(x_{0} - 2h) - 48f(x_{0} - h) + 25f(x_{0})}{12h}\) & \( + \frac{h^{4}}{5}f^{(5)}(\xi_{h})\)& backward diff. II\\%[1em]
%\end{tabular}
%\end{center}
%\newpage
\hline\hline
%\begin{center}
%\begin{tabular}{llll}
%\hline
\multirow{2}{*}{3-point} & \( f''(x_{0})=\frac{f(x_{0}) - 2f(x_{0} + h) + f(x_{0} + 2h)}{h^{2}}\) & \( + O(hf^{(3)}(\xi_{h}))\) & forward diff.\\%[1em]
 & \(f''(x_{0})=\frac{f(x_{0} - h) - 2f(x_{0}) + f(x_{0} + h)}{h^{2}}\) & \( + O(h^{2}f^{(4)}(\xi_{h}))\) & centered diff.\\%[1em]
\hline
\multirow{2}{*}{4-point} & \(f''(x_{0})=\frac{2f(x_{0}) - 5f(x_{0} + h) + 4f(x_{0} + 2h) - f(x_{0} + 3h)}{h^{2}}\) & \( + O(h^{2}f^{(4)}(\xi_{h}))\)& forward diff\\%[1em]
 & \( f''(x_{0})=\frac{2f(x_{0}) - 5f(x_{0} - h) + 4f(x_{0} - 2h) - f(x_{0} - 3h)}{h^{2}}\) & \( + O(h^{2}f^{(4)}(\xi_{h}))\)& backward diff\\%[1em]
\hline
\multirow{2}{*}{5-point} & \(f''(x_{0})=\frac{35f(x_{0}) - 104f(x_{0} + h) + 114f(x_{0} + 2h) - 56f(x_{0} + 3h) + 11f(x_{0} + 4h)}{12h^{2}}\) & \( + O(h^{3}f^{(5)}(\xi_{h}))\)& forward diff. I\\%[1em] 
& \(f''(x_{0})=\frac{11f(x_{0} - h) - 20f(x_{0}) + 6f(x_{0} + h) + 4f(x_{0} + 2h) - f(x_{0} + 3h)}{12h^{2}}\) & \( + O(h^{3}f^{(5)}(\xi_{h}))\)& forward diff. II\\%[1em]
& \(f''(x_{0})=\frac{ - f(x_{0} - 2h) + 16f(x_{0} - h) - 30f(x_{0}) + 16f(x_{0} + h) - f(x_{0} + 2h)}{12h^{2}}\) & \( + O(h^{4}f^{(6)}(\xi_{h}))\)& centered diff. \\%[1em]
\end{tabular}
\end{center}
\end{document}
